channel.title: Does anyone ever use Marble or Bumble?
channel.description: In my opinion, these are not stellar sounds. Has anyone ever used them successfully or creatively? Post your examples!

item.title: Does anyone ever use Marble or Bumble?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I have a few tracks using Marble, tho i think i only have 1 that’s released. Short track, but i wanted it to be heavy af and i think i mostly achieved that
https://soundcloud.com/m_x_c_n/untitled

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone ever use Marble or Bumble?
item.dc:creator: Indigoo
item.description:
I pretty much never use bumble, but about half of my song use marble. It’s really helpful for the type of sounds in quiet sections. It’s also one of the only sounds that can produce a good scratching sound (with use of pitch automaton)

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone ever use Marble or Bumble?
item.dc:creator: anon41616463
item.description:
I find it honestly hard to use Marble, especially for chords due to the distortion of the frequencies when played polyphonic. Plus it is a tad bit sharp, which is cool by itself, but not with other 440 hz-A tuned synths. I think it’s nice for like ambient or chillout though.

Read full topic
